name: Hungry Bird (hpnrep6)
description:
Game made for Major Jam 2

Description:
You're a slime trying to get away from a bird that wants to eat you.

Additional Info:
Originally was supposed to be played in the browser, but had issues exporting and executing the WebGL file. 

Game has been tested to be working on Linux and MacOS.

Game Github page: https://github.com/hpnrep6/HungryBird

Credits:
Music: TheAsianOnes https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO6z1xQ-pnwOOjH2wzaQ8XA
Sound Effects: https://freesfx.co.uk/
